title: Mantainence
body:
Dear riot,
When you do maintanence or something, either block queues 20/ 30 minutes beforehand, or just let the games that are running finish while not letting other queues open up, i hate getting halfway through a game only to dc while doing well because of mantainence. 

sincerely, 
a frustrated support main

replies.body:
now that servers are up I'm stuck in an endless loop of it trying to put me back in the game which doesn't exist because of the maintenance.

 It continuously tries to put me in the server of the previous can but fails and gives me a popup message saying so T_T I'm so clueless as to what to do to make it stop this loop.

If anyone lurks past** please help!!**

Hey there,

What you're experiencing is known as a "Ghost Game", these usually rectify themselves within a few hours at most. As this post is 12 hours old I can only assume that the issue is resolved, however please feel free to let me know if you require further assistance.
